abstract: HSBC, the world’s fourth-biggest bank, said first-half profit rose 25 percent, beating analysts’ estimates, on higher revenue from Asia. Costs for potential loan losses surged more than expected.
lead_paragraph: HSBC, the world’s fourth-biggest bank, said first-half profit rose 25 percent, beating analysts’ estimates, on higher revenue from Asia. Costs for potential loan losses surged more than expected.

headline.main: At HSBC, Profit Rises, As Do Bad Loan Provisions
